scripture_english: Jesus said to her, "I am the resurrection and the life. Whoever believes in me, though he die, yet shall he live."

scripture_chinese: 行善的复活得生，作恶的复活定罪
scripture_english: Those who have done good to the resurrection of life, and those who have done evil to the resurrection of judgment.

scripture_chinese: 我的帮助从造天地的耶和华而来
scripture_english: My help comes from the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
